thread.title: Solid, clean & updated hotel in Chelsea
thread.title_full: Solid, clean & updated hotel in Chelsea - Review of Four Points by Sheraton Manhattan Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: spacerwoman
title: Solid, clean & updated hotel in Chelsea
text: After staying in a hotel in Midtown that hadn't been updated in a while, I realized that for a quick, inexpensive night, I should stick to what I know. This hotel isn't fancy, it's a standard, solid Sheraton hotel. But it's super clean, comfortable bed, around the corner from a Whole Foods, cool coffee shops, 10 minute walk to the Highline, etc. I would stay here again for sure for work or fun. The pub attached is cool too - stopped in for a beer & soup and the staff is super friendly, good beer selection. They also give you free bottled water, which is great because I kept forgetting to buy it while out. I ordered room service and my food came pretty quickly and was good. Overall a great stay.
